name: untitled mania game (FREE FIRST MONTH)
description:
UMG is a project made by bixten on itch. It is a rhythm game, meant to be similar to FNF or any other mania game. Development started on 2022-08-23, and is nowhere near finished. Right now, there is only one game mode available, but more will be added. There is no real plot, just have fun and hit new highscores for now. If you download this, be on the lookout for updates, new ones will release every now and then on this itch page. This game will be priced at 2$ on 2022-09-24, so, might aswell get it now.

Controls

D, F, J, K or Left arrow key, Up arrow key, Down arrow key and Right arrow key. Once  the arrow collides with the responder, press the corresponding key.

Thanks

Sincere thanks for you being here. If you like the game, as always, sharing it with anyone else will be super helpful, whether it be your grandma or your pet goldfish.
